shortcodes.name: Animated Numbers
shortcodes.tooltip: Display an animated Number with subtitle

parameters.name: Number
parameters.description: Add a number here. It will be animated. You can also add non numerical characters. Valid examples: 24/7, 50.45, 99.9$, 90%, 35k, 200mm etc. Leading 0 will be kept, separated numbers will be ani

parameters.name: Start animation value
parameters.description: Add a number here to start the animation. Leave blank to start from 0. Only use numerical characters for a valid integer number.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: Add some content to be displayed below the number

shortcodes.name: Blog Posts
shortcodes.tooltip: Displays Posts from your Blog

shortcodes.name: Button
shortcodes.tooltip: Creates a colored button

parameters.name: Button Label
parameters.description: This is the text that appears on your button.

parameters.name: Button Title Attribute
parameters.description: Add a title attribute for this button. This is shown by most browsers as tooltip popup and is also used for aria-label.

shortcodes.name: Fullwidth Button
shortcodes.tooltip: Creates a colored button that stretches across the full width

parameters.name: Button Title
parameters.description: This is the text that appears on your button.

parameters.name: Button Title Attribute
parameters.description: Add a title attribute for this button. This is shown by most browsers as tooltip popup and is also used for aria-label.

shortcodes.name: Button Row
shortcodes.tooltip: Displays multiple buttons beside each other

parameters.name: Space between buttons
parameters.description: Define the space between the buttons. Leave blank for default space. Make sure you enter a valid positive number.

parameters.name: Button Label
parameters.description: This is the text that appears on your button.

parameters.name: Button Title Attribute
parameters.description: Add a title attribute for this button. This is shown by most browsers as tooltip popup and is also used for aria-label.

shortcodes.name: Catalogue
shortcodes.tooltip: Creates a pricing list

parameters.name: List Item Title
parameters.description: Enter the list item title here

parameters.name: List Item Description
parameters.description: Enter the item description here

parameters.name: Pricing
parameters.description: Enter the price for the item here. Eg: 34$, 55.5€, £12

parameters.name: Thumbnail Image
parameters.description: Either upload a new, or choose an existing image from your media library

parameters.name: Disable Item?
parameters.description: Temporarily disable and hide the item without deleting it, if its out of stock

shortcodes.name: av_cell_one_full
shortcodes.tooltip: Creates a single full width column

shortcodes.name: Chart
shortcodes.tooltip: Displays different types of charts based on static user data - or dynamic data with filter

parameters.name: X-Axis Labels
parameters.description: Add the descriptive x-axis lables for your data points. Separate with ;. Number of labels should correspond with number of datapoints. Default labels are created if needed.

parameters.name: Chart Title
parameters.description: Enter a title for the chart - better keep it short. Leave empty if not needed. Click outside input field to show more options if needed.

parameters.name: Container Background Color
parameters.description: Select a background color for container around the chart area

parameters.name: Chart Background Color
parameters.description: Select a background color for the chart area

parameters.name: Legend Text Color
parameters.description: Select a color for the legend of the data points. Leave empty for default.

parameters.name: X-Axis Legend Color
parameters.description: Select a color for the legend on the x-axis data points. Leave empty for default.

parameters.name: Y-Axis Legend Color
parameters.description: Select a color for the legend on the y-axis values. Leave empty for default.

parameters.name: Dataset Label
parameters.description: Define a label for your dataset. Will be displayed above the chart and on hover.

parameters.name: Color Picker Helper
parameters.description: Select a custom color which you can copy into the color settings textareas below.

parameters.name: Border/Line Colors
parameters.description: Add the border or line colors.

parameters.name: Background Colors
parameters.description: Add the background colors.

shortcodes.name: Code Block
shortcodes.tooltip: Add text, shortcodes, HTML, CSS, JavaScript and non executeable codesnippets to your website (without any formatting or text optimization).

parameters.name: Code Block Content. Add your own HTML/CSS/Javascript here
parameters.description: Enter some text/code/shortcode. You can also add plugin shortcodes here. Adding theme shortcodes is supported now for many elements. Be carefull not to nest same named shortcodes because this is not s

parameters.name: Code Wrapper Element
parameters.description: Wrap your code into a html tag (i.e. pre or code tag). Insert the tag without <>

parameters.name: Deactivate schema.org markup
parameters.description: Output the code without any additional wrapper elements. (not recommended)

shortcodes.name: Comments
shortcodes.tooltip: Add a comment form and comments list to the template

shortcodes.name: Contact Form
shortcodes.tooltip: Creates a customizable contact form

parameters.name: Form Title
parameters.description: Enter a form title that is displayed above the form

parameters.name: Submit Button Label
parameters.description: Enter the submit buttons label text here

parameters.name: Your E-Mail Address
parameters.description: Enter one or more E-Mail addresses (separated by comma) where mails should be delivered to.

parameters.name: E-Mail Subject
parameters.description: You can define a custom E-Mail Subject for your form here. If left empty the subject will be

parameters.name: Autoresponder From E-Mail Address
parameters.description: Enter the from E-Mail address for the autoresponder.

parameters.name: Autoresponder Reply To E-Mail Address
parameters.description: Enter one or more reply to E-Mail addresses (separated by comma) for the autoresponder mail. Leave blank if not needed.

parameters.name: Autoresponder Subject
parameters.description: Enter a custom subject text to the autoresponder E-Mail. Leave blank to use a default message.

parameters.name: Autorespond Text
parameters.description: Enter a message that will be sent to the users email address once he has submitted the form.

parameters.name: Hide Form Labels
parameters.description: Check if you want to hide form labels above the form elements. The form will instead try to use an inline label (not supported on old browsers)

shortcodes.name: Content Slider
shortcodes.tooltip: Display a content slider element

parameters.name: Heading
parameters.description: Do you want to display a heading above the slides?

parameters.name: Slide Title
parameters.description: Enter the slide title here (Better keep it short)

parameters.name: Slide Content
parameters.description: Enter some content here

shortcodes.name: Animated Countdown
shortcodes.tooltip: Display a countdown to a specific date

parameters.name: Timezone
parameters.description: Select the timezone of your date.

parameters.name: Smallest time unit
parameters.description: The smallest unit that will be displayed

parameters.name: Largest time unit
parameters.description: The largest unit that will be displayed

parameters.name: Countdown Finished Message
parameters.description: Enter a small message that is displayed when countdown has finished and hides the numbers. Leave empty if numbers should display 0.

shortcodes.name: Custom Layout
shortcodes.tooltip: Display the content of a custom layout. Also page, posts, portfolio,... can be selected.

shortcodes.name: Dynamic Data
shortcodes.tooltip: Displays formatted content of a custom field or post data

parameters.name: Text Color
parameters.description: Select a custom color for the text. Leave blank to use default.

shortcodes.name: Events Countdown
shortcodes.tooltip: Display a countdown to the next upcoming event

parameters.name: Which Entries?
parameters.description: Select one or more taxonomies to get the next event for countdown. If none are selected all events are used.

parameters.name: Smallest time unit
parameters.description: The smallest unit that will be displayed

parameters.name: Largest time unit
parameters.description: The largest unit that will be displayed

shortcodes.name: Featured Image Slider
shortcodes.tooltip: Display a Slideshow of featured images from various posts

parameters.name: Slider Width/Height Ratio
parameters.description: The slider will always stretch the full available width. Here you can enter the corresponding height (eg: 4:3, 16:9) or a fixed height in px (eg: 300px)

parameters.name: Title Color
parameters.description: Select a color for the title here. Leave blank for theme default.

shortcodes.name: Icon
shortcodes.tooltip: Display an icon with optional hover effect

parameters.name: Optional Tooltip
parameters.description: Add a tooltip for this icon. The tooltip will appear on mouse over

parameters.name: Icon Size
parameters.description: Enter the font size in px, em or %

parameters.name: Icon Color
parameters.description: Here you can set the color of the icon. Enter no value if you want to use the standard font color.

shortcodes.name: Fullscreen Slider
shortcodes.tooltip: Display a fullscreen slideshow element

parameters.name: Add Images
parameters.description: Here you can add new Images to the slideshow.

parameters.name: Slideshow Image Size
parameters.description: Choose image size for your slideshow.

parameters.name: Use first slides caption as permanent caption
parameters.description: If checked the caption will be placed on top of the slider. Please be aware that all slideshow link settings and other captions will be ignored then

parameters.name: Display a scroll down arrow
parameters.description: Check if you want to show a button at the bottom of the slider that takes the user to the next section by scrolling down

parameters.name: Caption Title
parameters.description: Enter a caption title for the slide here

parameters.name: Caption Text
parameters.description: Enter some additional caption text

shortcodes.name: Gallery
shortcodes.tooltip: Creates a custom gallery

parameters.name: Edit Gallery
parameters.description: Create a new Gallery by selecting existing or uploading new images

shortcodes.name: Google Map
shortcodes.tooltip: Display a google map with one or multiple locations

parameters.name: Display Zoom Control?
parameters.description: Check to display the controls at the right side of the map

parameters.name: Display Streetview Activation Control?
parameters.description: Check to display the control to activate streetview at the right side of the map

parameters.name: Custom Overlay Color
parameters.description: Select a custom color for your Map here. The map will be tinted with that color. Leave empty if you want to use the default map color

parameters.name: Fallback Image to replace Google Maps
parameters.description: Upload or select a fallback image that is displayed instead of Google Maps or until the map is loaded

parameters.name: Marker Tooltip
parameters.description: Enter some text here. If the user clicks on the marker the text will be displayed

parameters.name: Custom Map Marker Image
parameters.description: Use a custom Image as marker. (make sure that you use a square image, otherwise it will be cropped)

shortcodes.name: Special Heading
shortcodes.tooltip: Creates a special Heading

shortcodes.name: Headline Rotator
shortcodes.tooltip: Creates a text rotator for dynamic headings

parameters.name: Prepended static text
parameters.description: Enter static text that should be displayed before the rotating text

parameters.name: Appended static text
parameters.description: Enter static text that should be displayed after the rotating text

parameters.name: Activate Multiline?
parameters.description: Check if prepended, rotating and appended text should each be displayed on its own line

parameters.name: Custom Font Color
parameters.description: Select a custom font color. Leave empty to use the default

parameters.name: Rotating Text
parameters.description: Enter the rotating text here (better keep it short)

shortcodes.name: Horizontal Gallery
shortcodes.tooltip: Creates a horizontal scrollable gallery

parameters.name: Edit Gallery
parameters.description: Create a new Gallery by selecting existing or uploading new images

parameters.name: Initial Active Image
parameters.description: Enter the number of the image that should be focused initially. Leave empty for none, if invalid first image will be taken, if image number does not exist, the last image.

shortcodes.name: Separator / Whitespace
shortcodes.tooltip: Creates a delimiter/whitespace to separate elements

shortcodes.name: Icon Box
shortcodes.tooltip: Creates a content block with icon to the left or above

parameters.name: Title
parameters.description: Add an IconBox title here

parameters.name: Content
parameters.description: Add some content for this IconBox

shortcodes.name: Icon Circles
shortcodes.tooltip: Display a big circle with several icons displaying an info note on hover in center

parameters.name: First Active Icon
parameters.description: Enter the number of the first icon to be active when user scrolls to the element after pageload. Starts with 1. Leave empty if not needed.

parameters.name: Icons Color
parameters.description: Select a custom color for your icons here. Leave blank to use default.

parameters.name: Icons Background Color
parameters.description: Select a custom background color for your icons here. Leave blank to use default.

parameters.name: Icons Color On Hover
parameters.description: Select a custom color for your icons here on hover. Leave blank to use default.

parameters.name: Icons Background Color On Hover
parameters.description: Select a custom background color for your icons here. Leave blank to use default.

parameters.name: Circle Color
parameters.description: Select a custom circle color. Leave blank to use default.

parameters.name: Text Color
parameters.description: Select a custom color for your title and description here. Leave blank to use default.

parameters.name: Text Background Color
parameters.description: Select a custom color for your text background here. Leave blank to use default.

parameters.name: Mobile Display Of Description
parameters.description: Select to hide description text when element is viewed on different devices. Recommended for larger text to avoid overlapping the circle.

parameters.name: Title
parameters.description: Enter the title for your icon here. Keep it short.

parameters.name: Icon Color
parameters.description: Select a custom color for the icon here. Leave blank to use default.

parameters.name: Icon Background Color
parameters.description: Select a custom background color for the icon here. Leave blank to use default.

parameters.name: Icon Border Color
parameters.description: Select a custom border color for the icon here. Leave blank to use default.

parameters.name: Icon Color On Hover
parameters.description: Select a custom color for the icon here on hover. Leave blank to use default.

parameters.name: Icon Background Color On Hover
parameters.description: Select a custom background color for the icon here on hover. Leave blank to use default.

parameters.name: Icon Border Color On Hover
parameters.description: Select a custom border color for the icon here on hover. Leave blank to use default.

shortcodes.name: Icon/Flipbox Grid
shortcodes.tooltip: Creates a grid with optional icon, text and background images for tooltips or flipbox

parameters.name: Items Content Padding
parameters.description: Set the padding for the content of a grid item. Both pixel and % based values are accepted. eg: 30px, 5%. Leave empty to use theme default.

parameters.name: Grid Item Title
parameters.description: Enter the grid item title here - better keep it short

parameters.name: Grid Item Sub-Title
parameters.description: Enter the grid item sub-title here - better keep it short

parameters.name: Inverse Layout - Ignored For Tooltip
parameters.description: Check if you want to change front and backside. This will show the backside initially.

parameters.name: Background Image For Backside Flip Box - IGNORED When "Content Appears In Tooltip" Selected

shortcodes.name: Icon List
shortcodes.tooltip: Creates a list with nice icons beside

parameters.name: List Item Title
parameters.description: Enter the list item title here (Better keep it short)

parameters.name: List Item Content
parameters.description: Enter some content here

shortcodes.name: Image
shortcodes.tooltip: Inserts an image of your choice

parameters.name: Custom Title Attribute
parameters.description: Add a custom title attribute limited to this instance, replaces media gallery settings.

parameters.name: Custom Alt Attribute
parameters.description: Add a custom alt attribute limited to this instance, replaces media gallery settings.

shortcodes.name: Before-After Images
shortcodes.tooltip: Shows 2 overlayed images with a moveable divider to show difference between images.

parameters.name: After Image
parameters.description: Either upload a new, or choose an existing image from your media library.

parameters.name: Arrows Color
parameters.description: Select a color for the arrows. Leave empty for theme default.

parameters.name: Line Color
parameters.description: Select a color for the drag lines. Leave empty for theme default.

parameters.name: Custom Title Attribute Before Image
parameters.description: Add a custom title attribute limited to this instance, replaces media gallery settings.

parameters.name: Custom Alt Attribute Before Image
parameters.description: Add a custom alt attribute limited to this instance, replaces media gallery settings.

parameters.name: Custom Title Attribute After Image
parameters.description: Add a custom title attribute limited to this instance, replaces media gallery settings.

parameters.name: Custom Alt Attribute After Image
parameters.description: Add a custom alt attribute limited to this instance, replaces media gallery settings.

shortcodes.name: Image with Hotspots
shortcodes.tooltip: Inserts an image with one or many hotspots that show tooltips

parameters.name: Hotspot on mobile devices
parameters.description: Check if you always want to show the tooltips on mobile phones below the image. Recommended if your tooltips contain a lot of text

parameters.name: Tooltip
parameters.description: Enter a short descriptive text that appears if the user places his mouse above the hotspot

shortcodes.name: Advanced Layerslider
shortcodes.tooltip: Display a Layerslider Slideshow

shortcodes.name: Grid Row
shortcodes.tooltip: Add multiple Grid Rows below each other to create advanced grid layouts. Cells can be styled individually

shortcodes.name: OSM - Leaflet Map
shortcodes.tooltip: Displays a map based on OpenStreetMaps and Leaflet Map plugin

parameters.name: Marker Popup
parameters.description: Enter some text here that will be displayed above the marker. You may also include a link.

parameters.name: Tooltip
parameters.description: Enter an optional tooltip that is displayed when you hover over the marker (different from Marker Popup)

shortcodes.name: Lottie Animation
shortcodes.tooltip: Inserts a single lottie animation of your choice

parameters.name: Direct Link
parameters.description: Enter a hardcoded link to a lottie animation. If not empty this will override any selection from media library.

parameters.name: Animation Width
parameters.description: Add the width of the animation, e.g. 180px, 50%. Leave empty for default. Both CSS units are allowed, px is default.

parameters.name: Animation Height
parameters.description: Add the width of the animation, e.g. 180px, 50%. Leave empty for default. Both CSS units are allowed, px is default.

parameters.name: Background Color
parameters.description: Select your background color. Leave empty for transparent background

shortcodes.name: Magazine
shortcodes.tooltip: Display entries in a magazine like fashion

parameters.name: Display Tabs for each category selected above?
parameters.description: If checked and you have selected more than one taxonomy above, a tab will be displayed for each of them. Will be ignored when using Pagination.

parameters.name: Display Thumbnails?
parameters.description: If checked all entries that got a feature image will show it

parameters.name: Display Author?
parameters.description: If checked author of this entry will be shown

parameters.name: Display Categories?
parameters.description: If checked categories of this entry will be shown

parameters.name: Display Tags?
parameters.description: If checked tags of this entry will be shown

parameters.name: Display Element Heading?
parameters.description: If checked you can enter a heading title with a link for this element

parameters.name: Should the first entry be displayed bigger?
parameters.description: If checked the first entry will stand out with big image

shortcodes.name: Mailchimp Signup
shortcodes.tooltip: Creates a mailschimp signup form

parameters.name: Lists
parameters.description: Select the list that the user should be added to. The form will be build automatically based on the list that you have set up in mailchimp.

parameters.name: Double opt-in?
parameters.description: Check if you want people to confirm their email address before being subscribed (highly recommended)

parameters.name: Hide Form Labels
parameters.description: Check if you want to hide form labels above the form elements. The form will instead try to use an inline label (not supported on old browsers)

shortcodes.name: Masonry
shortcodes.tooltip: Display a fullwidth masonry/grid with blog entries

shortcodes.tooltip: Display a fullwidth masonry/grid gallery

parameters.name: Edit Gallery
parameters.description: Create a new Gallery by selecting existing or uploading new images

shortcodes.name: Notification

parameters.name: Title
parameters.description: This is the small title at the top of your notification.

parameters.name: Message
parameters.description: This is the text that appears in your notification.

shortcodes.name: av_one_full
shortcodes.tooltip: Creates a single full width column

parameters.name: Highlight Column
parameters.description: Highlight this column by making it slightly bigger

shortcodes.tooltip: Display a partner/logo Grid or Slider

parameters.name: Heading
parameters.description: Enter a heading to display above the images. Leave empty for no heading.

parameters.description: Here you can add new Images to the partner/logo element.

parameters.name: Use first slides caption as permanent caption
parameters.description: If checked the caption will be placed on top of the slider. Please be aware that all slideshow link settings and other captions will be ignored then

parameters.name: Image Caption
parameters.description: Display a image caption on hover

parameters.name: Create and Edit Audio Playlist
parameters.description: Here you can add new audio files to the playlist, remove files or reorder them.

parameters.name: Choose a Cover Image
parameters.description: Either upload a new or choose an existing image from your media library

shortcodes.name: Portfolio Grid

parameters.name: Which Categories Should Be Used For The Portfolio
parameters.description: You can select multiple categories here. The page will then show posts from only those categories

shortcodes.name: Post Metadata

parameters.name: Separator
parameters.description: Will be used to separate multiple metadata

parameters.name: Prepend a text
parameters.description: Enter a text that should be displayed before the selected metadata infos

parameters.name: Append a text
parameters.description: Enter a text that should be displayed after the selected metadata infos

parameters.name: Custom Font Color
parameters.description: Select a custom font color. Leave empty to use the default

parameters.name: Prepend A Text
parameters.description: Enter a text that should be displayed before the metadata info

parameters.name: Append A Text
parameters.description: Enter a text that should be displayed after the metadata info

shortcodes.tooltip: Display the content of another page (fullwidth)

shortcodes.name: Post Slider
shortcodes.tooltip: Display a Slideshow of Post Entries

shortcodes.name: Product Info
shortcodes.tooltip: Display the product information for the current product

shortcodes.name: Product Meta Info
shortcodes.tooltip: Display the product meta for the current product

shortcodes.name: Product Price
shortcodes.tooltip: Display the price for the current product

shortcodes.name: Product Reviews
shortcodes.tooltip: Display the reviews and review form for the current product

shortcodes.tooltip: Display the info and review tab for the current product

shortcodes.tooltip: Display a list of related products and/or up-sells

shortcodes.tooltip: Display a Slideshow of Product Entries

parameters.name: Progress Bars Title
parameters.description: Enter the Progress Bars title here

parameters.name: Progress Container Background Color
parameters.description: This color fills up the progress container to 100 %. Leave empty for theme default.

parameters.name: Title Font Color
parameters.description: Select a custom font color for title, icon and progress bar percentage. Leave empty for theme default.

parameters.name: Title Background Color
parameters.description: Select a custom color for background of the title, icon and progress bar percentage. Leave empty for theme default.

shortcodes.name: Promo Box

parameters.name: Content
parameters.description: Enter some content for Promo Box

shortcodes.name: Fullwidth Revolution Slider
shortcodes.tooltip: Display a fullwidth Revolution Slider

shortcodes.name: Instagram Feed
shortcodes.tooltip: Display an Instagram feed (Smash Balloon Plugin)

parameters.name: Exclude Content
parameters.description: Remove content which contain certain words or hashtags in the caption. Separate multiple entries by commas (e.g. #awesome,#mytag)

parameters.name: Filter Content
parameters.description: Only display content which contain certain words or hashtags in the caption. Separate multiple entries by commas (e.g. #awesome,#mytag)

parameters.name: Whitelist Content
parameters.description: Only display content that match one of the post ids in this "whitelist". Separate multiple entries by commas (e.g. 2,125)

parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: The width of your feed. Any number, add px (= default) or %.

parameters.name: Height
parameters.description: The height of your feed. Any number, add px (= default) or %.

parameters.name: Background color of the feed
parameters.description: Set a custom background color. Any hex color code.

parameters.name: Custom CSS Class
parameters.description: Add a CSS class to the feed container.

parameters.name: Spacing
parameters.description: The spacing around your photos. Any number, add px (= default) or %.

parameters.name: Headercolor
parameters.description: Set a custom color. Any hex color code.

parameters.name: Background color of the button
parameters.description: Set a custom color. Any hex color code.

parameters.name: Text color of the button
parameters.description: Set a custom color. Any hex color code.

parameters.name: Button text
parameters.description: Enter text used for the button.

parameters.name: Background color of the button
parameters.description: Set a custom color. Any hex color code.

parameters.name: Text color of the button
parameters.description: Set a custom color. Any hex color code.

parameters.name: Button text
parameters.description: Enter text used for the button.

parameters.name: Background color when hovering over a photo
parameters.description: Set a custom color. Any hex color code.

parameters.name: Text/icon color when hovering over a photo
parameters.description: Set a custom color. Any hex color code.

parameters.name: Number of characters
parameters.description: The number of characters of the caption to display. Any number.

parameters.name: Text color of the caption
parameters.description: Set a custom color. Any hex color code.

parameters.name: Size of caption text
parameters.description: The size of the caption text. Any number.

parameters.name: Color of the Likes & Comments
parameters.description: Set a custom color. Any hex color code.

parameters.name: Size of Likes & Comments
parameters.description: The size of the text. Any number.

parameters.name: Number of comments to show
parameters.description: Enter the number of comments to show in the lightbox. Any number.

parameters.name: Autoscroll distance
parameters.description: Enter the distance before the end of feed or page that triggers the loading of more content. Any number.

shortcodes.name: Page Split
shortcodes.tooltip: Add a page split to the template. A pagination helps the user to navigate to the previous/next content part. Do not use together with other pagination on this page.

shortcodes.name: Color Section
shortcodes.tooltip: Creates a section with unique background image and colors

parameters.name: Section Padding
parameters.description: Define the sections top and bottom padding

parameters.name: Custom Margins
parameters.description: If checked allows you to set a custom top and bottom margin. Otherwise the margin is calculated by the theme based on surrounding elements

parameters.name: Section Colors
parameters.description: The section will use the color scheme you select. Color schemes are defined on your styling page

parameters.name: Background Video
parameters.description: You can also place a video as background for your section. Enter the URL to the Video. Currently supported are Youtube, Vimeo and direct linking of web-video files (mp4, webm, ogv)

parameters.name: Enable Overlay?
parameters.description: Check if you want to display a transparent color and/or pattern overlay above your section background image/video

parameters.name: Display A Scroll Down Arrow

parameters.name: Slideshow Image and Video Size
parameters.description: Choose image and Video size for your slideshow.

parameters.name: Slider minimum height in pixel
parameters.description: This is helpful on smaller screens if you got a lot of text in your slider

parameters.name: Use first slides caption as permanent caption
parameters.description: If checked the caption will be placed on top of the slider. Please be aware that all slideshow link settings and other captions will be ignored then

parameters.name: Caption Title
parameters.description: Enter a caption title for the slide here

parameters.name: Caption Text
parameters.description: Enter some additional caption text

shortcodes.name: Social Buttons
shortcodes.tooltip: Create one or more social buttons to share a post or to link to your social profile

parameters.name: Small title
parameters.description: A small title above the buttons.

shortcodes.name: Fullwidth Sub Menu
shortcodes.tooltip: Display a sub menu

parameters.name: Sticky Submenu
parameters.description: If checked the menu will stick at the top of the page once it touches it. This option is ignored when burger menu icon is shown.

parameters.name: Menu Text
parameters.description: Enter the menu text here

shortcodes.name: Tabs
shortcodes.tooltip: Creates a tabbed content area

parameters.name: Initial Open
parameters.description: Enter the Number of the Tab that should be open initially.

parameters.name: Tab Title
parameters.description: Enter the tab title here (Better keep it short)

parameters.name: Tab Content
parameters.description: Enter some content here

shortcodes.name: Tab Section
shortcodes.tooltip: Add a fullwidth section with tabs that can contain columns and other elements

parameters.name: Initial Open
parameters.description: Enter the number of the tab that should be open initially (starting with 1). If tab number does not exist the first tab is taken.

parameters.name: Tab Title Background Color
parameters.description: Select a custom background color of the tab title bar. Enter no value if you want to use the standard color.

parameters.name: Tab Font Color
parameters.description: Select a custom text color for all tabs. Enter no value if you want to use the standard font color.

parameters.name: Active Tab Font Color
parameters.description: Select a custom text color for the active tab. Enter no value if you want to use the standard font color.

parameters.name: Tab Font Color On Hover
parameters.description: Select a custom text color for all tabs on hover. Enter no value if you want to use the standard font color.

parameters.name: Active Tab Font Color On Hover
parameters.description: Select a custom text color for the active tab on hover. Enter no value if you want to use the standard font color.

shortcodes.name: av_tab_sub_section
shortcodes.tooltip: Creates a single tab for the tab section element

parameters.name: Tab Title
parameters.description: Set a tab title

parameters.name: Active Tab Font Color
parameters.description: Select a custom font color for this tab when active. Leave empty for default color

parameters.name: Inactive Tab Font Color
parameters.description: Select a custom font color for this tab when inactive. Leave empty for default color

parameters.name: Active Tab Font Color On Hover
parameters.description: Select a custom font color for this tab when active. Leave empty for default color

parameters.name: Inactive Tab Font Color On Hover
parameters.description: Select a custom font color for this tab when inactive. Leave empty for default color

parameters.name: Custom Background Color
parameters.description: Select a custom background color for this section here. Leave empty for default color

shortcodes.name: Table
shortcodes.tooltip: Creates a data or pricing table

shortcodes.name: Team Member
shortcodes.tooltip: Display a team members image with additional information

parameters.name: Team Member Name
parameters.description: Name of the person

parameters.name: Team Member Job Title
parameters.description: Job title of the person.

parameters.name: Team Member Description
parameters.description: Enter a few words that describe the person

parameters.name: Hover Text
parameters.description: Text that appears if you place your mouse above the Icon

parameters.name: Icon Link
parameters.description: Enter the URL of the page you want to link to

shortcodes.name: Testimonials
shortcodes.tooltip: Creates a Testimonial Grid

parameters.name: Image
parameters.description: Either upload a new, or choose an existing image from your media library

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: Enter the Name of the person to quote

parameters.name: Subtitle below name
parameters.description: Can be used for a job description

parameters.name: Quote
parameters.description: Enter the testimonial here

parameters.name: Website Link
parameters.description: Link to the persons website

parameters.name: Website Name
parameters.description: Linktext for the above Link

shortcodes.name: Text Block
shortcodes.tooltip: Creates a simple text block with collapse support

parameters.name: Content
parameters.description: Enter some content for this textblock

shortcodes.name: Timeline
shortcodes.tooltip: Creates a timeline

parameters.name: Milestone Date
parameters.description: Enter the milestone date here. This can be any format. Use filter avf_customize_heading_settings to change the html tag.

parameters.name: Milestone Title
parameters.description: Enter the Milestone Title here. Use filter avf_customize_heading_settings to change the html tag.

parameters.name: Milestone Content
parameters.description: Enter some content here

shortcodes.name: Accordion
shortcodes.tooltip: Creates toggles or accordions (can be used for FAQ)

parameters.name: Initial Open
parameters.description: Enter the Number of the Accordion Item that should be open initially. Set to Zero if all should be close on page load

parameters.name: Toggle Title
parameters.description: Enter the toggle title here (better keep it short)

parameters.name: Toggle Content
parameters.description: Enter some content here

parameters.name: Toggle Sorting Tags
parameters.description: Enter any number of comma separated tags here. If sorting is active the user can filter the visible toggles with the help of these tags

parameters.name: For Developers: Custom Toggle ID
parameters.description: Insert a custom ID for the element here. Make sure to only use allowed characters (latin characters, underscores, dashes and numbers, no special characters can be used)

parameters.name: Collapsed Aria-Label Text
parameters.description: Enter a complete text to be used in aria-label attribute when the toggle is collapsed. Leave empty to use toggle title.

parameters.name: Expanded Aria-Label Text
parameters.description: Enter a complete text to be used in aria-label attribute when the toggle is expanded. Leave empty to use toggle title.

shortcodes.name: Upcoming Events
shortcodes.tooltip: Show a list of upcoming events

parameters.name: Which Entries?
parameters.description: Select which entries should be displayed by selecting a taxonomy. If none are selected all events are shown.

shortcodes.name: Video
shortcodes.tooltip: Display a video

parameters.name: Save Video Thumbnail Locally
parameters.description: Download the video preview thumbnail and save it in the media library

parameters.name: Enable Autoplay
parameters.description: Check if you want to enable video autoplay when page is loaded. Videos will be muted by default.

parameters.name: Mute Video Player
parameters.description: Check if you want to mute the video.

parameters.name: Loop Video Player
parameters.description: Check if you want to loop the video and play it from the beginning again

parameters.name: Hide Video Controls
parameters.description: Check if you want to hide the controls (works for youtube and self hosted videos)

parameters.name: Show Fullscreen Button (HTML5 videos)
parameters.description: Check if you want to show the fullscreen button for HTML5 videos (setting is ignored for other type of videos)

shortcodes.name: Search
shortcodes.tooltip: Displays a search form

parameters.name: Placeholder
parameters.description: Enter a placeholder text for the input field

parameters.name: Label Text
parameters.description: Enter a label text for the button

parameters.name: Inputfield And Button Border Radius
parameters.description: Set the border radius of the input field and the button
